subject: Football
Super Bowl
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Pro football wouldn’t be what it is now if it hadn’t been for Lamar Hunt, who not only founded the American Football League in 1959, but also negotiated the 1966 merger that created the Super Bowl.
snippet: Pro football wouldn’t be what it is now if it hadn’t been for Lamar Hunt, who not only founded the American Football League in 1959, but also negotiated the 1966 merger that created the Super Bowl.
